taskbody.context: A package cannot exist outside a project. The following steps assume that you have an existing Design Studio (DS) Workbench project. There is no limit to the number of packages that you can create in a project.

step.cmd: On the DS Navigator view pane, right-click on the DS designer (for example, Pageflow Designer, Workflow Designer) in which you want to create a package and select New Package .
step.stepresult: The Create Model Package dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: In the Model Package Name field, type the name of the new package.

step.stepresult: The new package is displayed in the DS Navigator view pane as a package in the project of the selected DS designer.
